text: Danton () is a 1983 French Polish German historical drama movie directed by Andrzej Wajda and was based on the 1929 play The Danton Case by Stanisława Przybyszewska. It stars Gérard Depardieu, Wojciech Pszoniak, Patrice Chéreau, Jerzy Trela, Bogusław Linda, Angela Winkler, Andrzej Seweryn, Serge Merlin and was distributed by Gaumont. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 drama movies Category:1980s historical movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:French drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in the 1780s Category:Movies set in the 1790s Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Wajda
title: Danton (1983 movie)
